About

Hey! I'm Katie Cunningham.

I am currently the Computer Science Education Coordinator at Cal State Monterey Bay and Hartnell College. I work closely with students from the Salinas Valley to ensure they obtain the education they need to compete for top opportunities in software engineering and other computing careers. I have developed and currently manage many programs to achieve this goal, including TA++, Peer-Led Team Learning, and Cohort Enrichment.

Contact me: katieirenec AT gmail

Visit me online: LinkedIn Twitter Github Old blog
